description: This is the fourth and last module of the executive certificate programme called Qualitative Methods for Health Education Research & Quality Improvement (QUAL-E). This module covers the methods to disseminate qualitative data. Three topics will be discussed. The first focuses on how to write a qualitative manuscript (education research and quality improvement papers). The second discusses issues pertaining to journal selection. The third provides guidance on how to respond to peer reviewersâ€™ comments.
title: Disseminating Qualitative Scholarship
